basics.name: Carlos Macoy Rountree Robles
basics.label: Software Engineer / Web Developer
basics.summary: I'm a FullStack Developer from Hermosillo, México with Bachelor's degree in Software Engineering from the Universidad de Sonora and have experience with MEVN and MERN stack projects, as well as QuasarJs, NestJS, PostgreSQL, TailwindCSS, Sass and Playwright (Testing E2E)  . I enjoy exploring different technologies and learning how to face and resolve challenges. My experience in carrying out web projects has allowed me to tackle various challenges, improve performance, and enhance both my individual and team work.

work.name: Sistemas ALM
work.position: Frontend Developer / Tester End to End
work.summary: I developed the redesign of the company's web app: A post-harvest product manager, enhancing the UI, I implemented a new navbar integrating all the important sections of the app and rendering it responsive,Add new toast notification design to improving UX, added new catalogs, and optimized processes for traceability and product labeling implementing a new pdf library, improving label's printing times. Additionally, i lead the end-to-end testing process to ensure app quality.

work.name: Centro de Servicios de Tecnología de la Información (CSTI)
work.summary: Provided technical support for both hardware and software to users and classrooms in the Industrial Engineering Department at the Universidad de Sonora. I also I developed the frontend of an app to generate pdf for the Department's secretary, saving time to printing activities.

projects.name: Dental-App
projects.description: Dental-App is a web application CRUD that allows users to schedule appointments with dentists, Edit, Delete, and Update them. It also allows users/Admin to register and log in to the application.

projects.name: Udemy Landing Page
projects.description: A SAP Udemy landing page, is a clone of the Udemy website, responsive design,mobile-first,Flexbox,Grid,and BEM methodology

projects.name: Portfolio Mac
projects.description: Professional portfolio and CV with the ability to download it as a PDF and print it. It can be modified only manipulating the JSON file of the project.
